tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve information about a specific post on Thread. You can use it to retrieve details such as the post title, description, image, video, gif. With the Threads Downloader API, you can easily access and leverage the wealth of information available on Thread.  telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
